snippet: English Premier League football club Manchester United showed its commercial strength when it raised its core earnings expectations for the year despite indifferent form this season....

lead_paragraph: English Premier League football club Manchester United showed its commercial strength when it raised its core earnings expectations for the year despite indifferent form this season.

snippet: Leicester's first target was exceeded long ago: Premier League survival. Another landmark was achieved Sunday: Champions League qualification for the first time. By the end of the month, Leicester should have secured the prize once simply unthinka...

headline.main: Leicester Edges Closer to EPL Title, Spurs Beats Man United
headline.print_headline: Leicester Edges Closer to EPL Title, Spurs Beats Man United

lead_paragraph: Leicester's first target was exceeded long ago: Premier League survival. Another landmark was achieved Sunday: Champions League qualification for the first time. By the end of the month, Leicester should have secured the prize once simply unthinkable for such a team: the Premier League trophy itself.

snippet: Chelsea's Brazilian players led emotional Premier League tributes on Saturday to the victims of the Chapecoense football club who died in Monday's Colombian air crash....

headline.main: Chelsea's Brazilians Lead Tributes to Chapecoense Victims
headline.print_headline: Chelsea's Brazilians Lead Tributes to Chapecoense Victims

lead_paragraph: Chelsea's Brazilian players led emotional Premier League tributes on Saturday to the victims of the Chapecoense football club who died in Monday's Colombian air crash.

snippet: Liverpool’s improbable ambitions of making the Premier League’s top four were dealt a blow when the team squandered a two-goal lead and lost, 3-2, at Southampton on Sunday....
abstract: Southampton soccer team defeats Liverpool, 3-2; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Liverpool’s improbable ambitions of making the Premier League’s top four were dealt a blow when the team squandered a two-goal lead and lost, 3-2, at Southampton on Sunday.

snippet: British police investigating allegations of widespread child sex abuse at soccer clubs dating back to the 1970s said on Friday they had identified 83 potential suspects and possible links to  98 clubs, including some from the Premier League....

headline.main: British Police Say Soccer Child Sex Scandal May Affect 98 Clubs
headline.print_headline: British Police Say Soccer Child Sex Scandal May Affect 98 Clubs

lead_paragraph: British police investigating allegations of widespread child sex abuse at soccer clubs dating back to the 1970s said on Friday they had identified 83 potential suspects and possible links to  98 clubs, including some from the Premier League.

snippet: English clubs took their spending on players for the season soaring past 1 billion pounds on Monday, but the biggest signing on transfer deadline day was that of a manager as Manchester City confirmed Pep Guardiola will take over this summer....

headline.main: Guardiola to Man City, English Spending Passes 1 Billion Pounds
headline.print_headline: Guardiola to Man City, English Spending Passes 1 Billion Pounds

lead_paragraph: English clubs took their spending on players for the season soaring past 1 billion pounds on Monday, but the biggest signing on transfer deadline day was that of a manager as Manchester City confirmed Pep Guardiola will take over this summer.

snippet: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini said his single season at Real Madrid was the "most painful" period of his coaching career and criticised the club's transfer policy when he was in charge....

headline.main: Pellegrini Still Haunted by 'Painful' Time at Real Madrid
headline.print_headline: Pellegrini Still Haunted by 'Painful' Time at Real Madrid

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini said his single season at Real Madrid was the "most painful" period of his coaching career and criticised the club's transfer policy when he was in charge.

snippet: Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero expects incoming manager Pep Guardiola to be a hard task master who will extract the best out of a side that has shone domestically but struggled against Europe's elite....

headline.main: Aguero Expects Guardiola to Push Man City to New Heights
headline.print_headline: Aguero Expects Guardiola to Push Man City to New Heights

lead_paragraph: Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero expects incoming manager Pep Guardiola to be a hard task master who will extract the best out of a side that has shone domestically but struggled against Europe's elite.

snippet: Manchester United's injury problems are easing with Phil Jones, Antonio Valencia and Marouane Fellaini in contention to face West Bromwich Albion on Sunday, manager Louis van Gaal said....

headline.main: Fit-Again Jones, Valencia and Fellaini Boost Man United
headline.print_headline: Fit-Again Jones, Valencia and Fellaini Boost Man United

lead_paragraph: Manchester United's injury problems are easing with Phil Jones, Antonio Valencia and Marouane Fellaini in contention to face West Bromwich Albion on Sunday, manager Louis van Gaal said.
